task_description: Facing the building to your North (approx. 8°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: I need to see the full height of the building to estimate it, so I will start by looking up to find the roof.
I have seen the top of the building, and now I need to look down to see the base to estimate the full height.
I have now seen the top and the bottom of the building by looking up and down; I can now estimate the height based on the number of floors and typical floor height.
